children.subject: 5th year masters requires that you have a professor who will sponsor your thesis and write you a recommendation letter. Therefore, it is better that you do research at the university. If you do research with professor, he/she will write you a better letter. Also, since one year is a short time to write a thesis, you want to hit the ground running and that is only possible if you already know what your thesis will be about and if you are familiar with your supervisor.

history.content: Can I do a research project at say LBNL or another research institution not directly connected to UC Berkeley and have it count as the research required for the 5th year master?
history.subject: If I do research not at Berkeley, can I still do the 5th Years Masters
